metadata.Title: CVE-2018-19837 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In LibSass prior to 3.5.5, Sass::Eval::operator()(Sass::Binary_Expression*) inside eval.cpp allows attackers to cause a denial-of-service resulting from stack consumption via a crafted sass file, because of certain incorrect parsing of '%' as a modulo operator in parser.cpp.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-19837` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsass1 - 3.4.8-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libsass package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.4.8-1').
